name: GravBlocks
description: The abduction has begun! Can you meet the challenge or will you fall to these alien jerks?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel I3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Graphics 4000
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460

reviews.review_text: A good idea, poorly executed. Weak controls, bad art and UI. This game could and should be good. It just needs a complete presentation overhaul.
